body.name: Wantdo Boy's Warm Winter Coat Waterproof Down Parka Thicken Filling Puffer Jacket with Hood
features: Embraced with Warmth - The fleece-lined winter jacket features a detachable hood could rap your kids up in comfort, perfect for chilly days and frosty nights.
Protects Against Rain & Water - , The kids boys' winter puffer jacket is made with a PU membrane and a DWR coating of 3000mm waterproofing index, to keep your kids dry and comfortable all day.
Stretchy Feel on Free Movement - The kid boys' warm puffer coat comes with soft and stretcy materials , to guarantee absolute comfort and mobility.
Keep Cold & Snow Out - The winter outerwear coat for kid boys has elastic cuffs, providing ultimate protection against the harsh winter elements, and keeping your child comfortable and dry.

An Essential Winter Jacket for Kids - The insulated winter coat is boasted with robust SBS zippers on the hand pockets, built for longevity. Plus, the padded interior ensures your child's hands remain warm during the winter season.
body.description: Wantdo Boy's Winter Warm Collection: A Durable Waterproof Puffer Jacket for Winter Adventures By Wantdo Even on cold and rainy winter days, boys still love to venture out and have fun in the outdoors. Parents need to choose the right waterproof winter jacket for their lovely boys. Wantdo Boys Winter offers warmth, comfort, water resistance, and durability, the important aspects that every parent considers. The warm fleece-lined puffer coat for boys is pretty much the best choice for daily school or outdoor wear. Stay warm and cozy with the fleeced lining and hood of this essential daily winter outerwear jacket. It's thick enough to keep your boys warm even during very cold weather. The windproof puffer jacket is designed with elastic cuffs, keeping rain and cold air from entering the sleeves. The wide, soft collar on the fleeced winter coat fully covers your child's neck. The winter fleece jacket with a hood is made with stretchy material, allowing your child to move freely and enjoy playing in the winter to the fullest. The thick warm winter coat could stand strongly against tearing and abrasion well. The waterproof snow jacket has two zippered hand pockets to keep boys' hands warm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our mission is to build products that are essential for active performance wear users. We aim to create versatile products that can be worn in various conditions, whether it's hiking in the mountains or strolling around town. By designing active performance wear with features such as waterproofing, stain repellency, fast-drying capabilities, and warmth, Wantdo becomes an indispensable part of our customers' daily lives. Windproof Puffer Jacket Warm Winter Coat Waterproof Winter Jacket: 3000 mmH2O Padded Puffer Coat Daily School Wear , Outdoor Adventure, Hiking & Travel. Wantdo Boy's Winter Warm Collection: A Durable Waterproof Puffer Jacket for Winter Adventures By Wantdo Even on cold and rainy winter days, boys still love to venture out and have fun in the outdoors. Parents need to choose the right waterproof winter jacket for their lovely boys. Wantdo Boys Winter offers warmth, comfort, water resistance, and durability, the important aspects that every parent considers. The warm fleece-lined puffer coat for boys is pretty much the best choice for daily school or outdoor wear. Stay warm and cozy with the fleeced lining and hood of this essential daily winter outerwear jacket. It's thick enough to keep your boys warm even during very cold weather. The windproof puffer jacket is designed with elastic cuffs, keeping rain and cold air from entering the sleeves. The wide, soft collar on the fleeced winter coat fully covers your child's neck. The winter fleece jacket with a hood is made with stretchy material, allowing your child to move freely and enjoy playing in the winter to the fullest. The thick warm winter coat could stand strongly against tearing and abrasion well. The waterproof snow jacket has two zippered hand pockets to keep boys' hands warm.

Wantdo Boys' Waterproof Puffer Jacket Warm Winter Outerwear Coat Winter's cold temperatures and damp air make it crucial for parents to find a winter jacket that keeps their children both warm and dry while providing comfort and ease of movement. The Wantdo boy's puffer coat offers full protection and ensures that boys stay comfortable even on very cold or snowy days. Advanced Waterproofing Technology The Wantdo boy's windproof winter coat has an outer surface with a 3000mm waterproofing index, providing ample protection from rain or snow, which performs well to keep water from seeping into boys' bodies to cause chills. The waterproof winter jacket could make boys stay dry and warm while playing outdoors. Full Body Warmth System The warm winter coat is designed to withstand various weather conditions, from rain to snow, and cool to cold temperatures. The fleeced winter outerwear jacket for boys comes with a detachable hood, adjustable drawstring, and full zip placket, which work together to create a seal against the cold air that rushes in while sliding down the mountainside. Key Features for Winter Daily Wear The winter fleece jacket has SBS zippers, which are easy to zip up or down and are durable with an anti-corrosion function that allows for years of use.The warm winter jacket has two zippered hand pockets to keep boys' hands warm.The wide, soft collar on this fleeced winter coat fully covers your child's neck.

Detachable Hood The boy's warm winter coat has a detachable hood, which is easy to zip on and off. Its wide and soft collar provides ample coverage for the neck to keep the cold and snow out. Additionally, the fleeced hood of the boy's waterproof winter jacket helps keep your child's head warm and cozy for added comfort. Windproof Placket With a smooth and durable built-in SBS zipper, the boys' thick winter coat greatly keeps cold air from penetrating inside. The good-quality anti-corrosion and non-deforming materials of the boy's warm puffer jacket ensure that they will provide optimal performance for years to use. Elastic Cuffs The boys' warm puffer coat comes with elastic cuffs, ensuring that no cold air or water enters the sleeves of the winter jacket, keeping your child's arms dry and warm.

Wantdo Boys’ Waterproof Winter Coat Warm Fleeced Jacket ET012 The winter jacket for boys could be an essential piece of clothing in this cold & wet winter for your child. Play, Run, Freely Enjoy. Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket The boy's puffer coat is made of advanced PU membrane, which has a waterproof performance of 3000mm, resisting light rain and snow. Breathable Winter Outerwear Jackets The boy's winter fleece coat has good breathability, suitable for light-intensity outdoor activities such as traveling, hiking, and camping. The boys' winter coat is wear-resistant, so there is no need to worry about the child slipping and causing friction with the ground, or being scratched by branches and twigs. Warm Fleeced Winter Jacket with Removable Hood The boy's warm winter jacket has a fleece lining, which is soft and breathable. The hood is also fleece-lined. This winter puffer jacket could provide full-body warmth for boys and boys. Padded Puffy Parka Coat Windproof The winter snow coat features a large hood with a hook and loop, an SBS-zippered placket, and adjustable cuffs. These designs of the winter coat can effectively resist the entry of cold winds and cold snow, providing children with comprehensive warmth inside and out. Comfortable Winter Snow Coats with Zippered Pockets The boys' warm puffer jacket is made of soft fabric, which is convenient for children to move freely. The winter jacket has 2 large zippered handy pockets, enough for storing small items such as tissues, chocolates, gloves, mobile phones, etc. Active and Fashionable Outerwear Jackets & Coats for Little & Big Boys The boy's winter clothing adopts a bubble style, with bright and fashionable colors. Multiple colors and sizes (6-16) are available for children of different ages to choose from. Whether playing in the snow outdoors or having daily school wear, the boys' winter outerwear jacket is a great choice for boys. Notes: Regular fit. Please refer to our size chart and measurement method to ensure that you choose the right size. Hand or machine washing is okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter Coat
reviews.reviewText: Bought coat back in fall but as a Michigander we are seeing the winter season. Coat has been keeping son warm/dry so far in the rainy/snow season. Reasonable price and quality of coat is decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a perfect fit and very good for the cold weather.
reviews.reviewText: My son is happy with his new coat. He says it keeps him warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puffy and light. Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the quality of this jacket. Compared to the price, it was super light, puffy, and warm. The only difference between the description and the actual jacket was the blue lining; the photo on the website is only the grey color without any linings, but the jacket has blue lines along the chest and arms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It’s a solid winter coat at a good price. Would have loved zip pockets, inside pockets, just any pockets besides the 2 shallow open side pockets. Kids lose gloves. I see that in our future with this coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, runs a bit small.
reviews.reviewText: This design was different so I really wanted my grandchild to have this. It just fit. He said it blocked the wind and kept him warm. I had also put 2 shirts on him. I think it runs small and unfortunately he won't be able to wear it next year. Since he said he liked it, I kept it. I feel I got my money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was very comfy it keeps me okay even in the winter, it is very thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars absolutely beautifully perfect amazing fit, color is prefect!
